did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Charles L. Poindexter was a mining engineer in Tombstone, Arizona. The collection includes a photocopy of notes relating to mine construction and operation, financial and surveying matters, assay reports, chiefly of the Tombstone Consolidated Mines Company, Ltd.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Photocopy of notes relating to mine construction and operation, financial and surveying matters, assay reports, chiefly of the Tombstone Consolidated Mines Company, Ltd.
Original in the possession of Mrs. Burton Devere in Tombstone, Arizona.
